WorkItem.Description: while optimizing, there's no way to say you only have 1 of an item. so while optimizing it may tell you to use 2 1-handed weapons that you only have 1 of.
WorkItem.Summary: unable to say you only have 1 of an item

Comments.Message:
Because the items themselves are not inherently unique, the program doesn't know that you only have one of the items available.  Simple fix: edit the item in question, and force it to be Unique.

Please do a search next time, before reporting an issue, to see if it's been mentioned or resolved previously.
